Package tripleplay.util

Added Classes and Interfaces
Bag An unordered collection of elements which may contain duplicates.
BitVec A bit vector.
Deflater Encodes typed data into a string.
DestroyableBag Maintains a bag of Destroyable instances which can all be cleared at once.
DoubleTapper Detects double taps on a layer, using a threshold time between taps.
EffectRenderer.Gradient  
Inflater Inflates data encoded by Deflater.
Instances Provides utility functions for dealing with Instances
Instances.Op  
StyledText Manages styled text.
StyledText.Block Multiple lines of plain (uniformly styled) text.
StyledText.Plain A shared base class for single- and multi-line plain text.
StyledText.Span A single line of plain (uniformly styled) text.
Tapper Detects taps on a layer.
TextStyle Describes everything needed to style a particular run of text.
TexturePacker A runtime texture packer.
TexturePacker.Renderer  
 

Changed Classes
EffectRenderer Handles the rendering of text with a particular effect (shadow, outline, etc.).
EffectRenderer.PixelOutline  
EffectRenderer.Shadow  
EffectRenderer.VectorOutline  
Glyph Handles the maintenance of a canvas image and layer for displaying a chunk of pre-rendered graphics.
Interpolator Abstracts the process of interpolation between two values.
Layers Provides utility functions for dealing with Layers
TextConfig @deprecated Use TextStyle and StyledText.
